DOC.brief_summary: Diagnostic of diabetes in childhood brought modification of family way of life, particularly in child and caregivers lifes. The education patient programs are in France centered on curative competencies of care. It is possible that art-therapy improve psycho-social competencies The aim of the study is to evaluate art-therapy sessions on quality of life of caregivers
DOC.brief_title: Study of Impact of Art Therapy Sessions Given to Family Caregivers of Children With Type 1 Diabetes
